info.title: WEATHER REST API
info.description: JSON REST API for weather readings

get.summary: Get readings By device name and page

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: the number of documents on the page

400.description: No readings found by device name

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of documents on the page

get.summary: Get readings By device name/ date & hour, returning the temperature, atmospheric pressure, radiation and precipitation.

400.description: No readings found by device dame/datetime

get.summary: Get max temp By datetime,returning the Sensor Name, reading date / time and the Temperature value

200.description: Found max temp by device datetime

400.description: No Found max temp by device datetime

get.summary: Get max precipitation by device name in 5 months, returning the sensor name, reading date / time and the precipitation value

200.description: Found max precipitation by device name

400.description: No Found max precipitation by device name

post.summary: Create device name and a new reading

400.description: Station and reading have not been created

post.summary: Create device name and new multiple readings

400.description: Station and reading have not been created

200.description: Updated precipitation by device name and DocumentID

400.description: precipitation by device name and DocumentID has not updated

200.description: Updated precipitation by device name and DocumentID

400.description: precipitation by device name and DocumentID has not updated
